item.title: What Are You Hiding?
item.description: The C++ visibility model is broken by design. By visibility model I mean using the keywords private, public and protected to manage how objects relate to each other. I will explain exactly how such model is broken and propose a workaround to it. I admit I am not the first one to realize that, as I have been writting C++ for just a decade, whereas there are more skilled programmers than me or with way more experience.
